title.full: The Legend of Spyro A New Beginning
title.reduced: The Legend of Spyro A New Beginning

description.full: An Xbox 360 hard drive is required to use this item. Single Player. GAME-PLAY ALERT: This game has been fully tested to successfully play on your Xbox 360 console. However, in some cases, you may see some minor irregularities with audio/video for brief periods. For more details, see www.xbox.com/xboxoriginals. Uncover Spyro's secret history as you embark on a dangerous quest to face off against the ultimate creation of the Dark Master, Cynder. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
